item.description:
***UPDATE: Due to unprecidented demand for this restaurant, I am increasing the number of spaces for this event to 30. The restaurant is willing to sit us in 2 tables of 15, with each table having it's own beverage bill and food bill. This is a trial run, so let's hope it's a success!***

OK, everybody, thanks so much for being patient with me! It has been "one of those months" so everything is kinda crazy right now. Since that is the case, I went the sort of easy route and I picked one of my favorite restaurants this month. It is the Grille on Main in East Greenwich. It's a great restaurant with lots of ecclectic food choices, simple and easygoing environment. This is the website to get more information here, which includes a PDF of their menu.

Because last month's payment went so smoothly, I am suggesting we do it that way again. Basically we will have one bill for food, which will be divided equally among members then a second bill for beverages and alcohol. This way we can order appetizers as a table and everyone can enjoy with minimal confusion. Then the ones who choose not to indulge in "adult beverages" won't have to worry about paying extra when just enjoying non-alcoholic drinks. Please let me know if this is a problem for you.

If the meeting fills up, and you are interested in attending, please RSVP "No", but add a note that you "would like to be wait listed".

Also, if you have paid the $1 towards Meetup fees at the last Dine Out event you attended, you do not need to pay this time. I am trying to keep it where people only have to pay at every other event attended.

Thanks again everyone for your patience! I really enjoy this group and look forward to it every month.

Here's to good food and good conversation!
